name: Volbeat
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves ILLUMISE’s sweet aroma.

poke_power.name: Light Conduct
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Illumise in play, you may search your discard pile for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. This power can’t be used if Volbeat is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Firefly Light
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
